english.segment1: Where's your faith girl?. Did it slip through the tent?. As quick as it left God's. Left God's lips. And it's been six years now. And as you were not able to. Prepare for the sorrow. You will not be able to. Prepare for the glory
english.segment2: Hey brother. The time is soon. Hey mother. It's almost over
english.segment3: Where's my faith now?. I'm glad it doesn't' depend. It doesn't depend on me. And I will rest in You. And I will rely in You
english.segment4: Hey brother. The time is soon. Hey mother. It's almost over. It's a time for new beginnings. Well it's a time for change
english.segment5: Yeah. A time for. It's a time for change
english.segment6: We will see the day. Promises will be fulfilled. We will see the day. When these promise will be. It's a time for. New beginnings. It's a time for. New beginnings
